channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2025031199
item.description:
Report X-2025031199

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-27T15:24:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-15
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the GEGR location a spill agent was called for a spilled shipment. While repackaging affected shipment they discovered that one shipment contained a plastic bucket with a 5.1 DG placard on it. Printing on the bucket labeled the contents as a UN2880. The outer fiberboard box did not have any DG markings or paperwork required for transit. It was place into a steel salvage package and is being held for the FAA.

item.title: Report X-2025030861
item.description:
Report X-2025030861

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-15
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the GEGR location a fiberboard box was discovered with signs of a release. While investigating the shipment it was discovered that the plastic bucket inside was placarded as UN2880 and the removeable lid was damaged causing the release. The outer fiberboard box did not have any DG markings or paperwork required for transport. It was placed into a steel salvage package and is being held for the FAA.

item.title: Report E-2025030191
item.description:
Report E-2025030191

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-06
  • City: SPOKANE VALLEY
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Carrier picked up the 5 gallon cube from the customer, Hollister Stier, and loaded the waste onto the truck. Driver made other pickups throughout the day. When the driver arrived at the branch, it was discovered that the waste was leaking from the cap and had contaminated another container. In-house spill response team was activated. They were able to clean up the spill and decontaminate the leaking and leaked-on package. Both items were overpacked and shipped to final destination without incident.
